welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fallston, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our vibrant community and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights at Glenn L Martin Airport.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights at Glenn L Martin Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is primarily used for domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at BWI handles all international flights, as well as some domestic flights operated by international carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
